Description: Returns transfers with the community pool address as either sender or recipient
Max number of items to be returned, defaults to 100
Skip the first N results. This can be used to fetch all results since the API caps at 100
The starting timestamp in UNIX milliseconds that the transfers must be equal or older than
The ending timestamp in UNIX milliseconds that the transfers must be equal or younger than
Transfers where either the sender or the recipient is one of the addresses
Number of results to include per page
Token specifying the next page of results to get
